block.p: Lesley Beth Harris, the daughter of Hilary and Stanley Harris of Lexington, Mass., was married yesterday to Jay Aaron Palmer, the son of Julian J. Palmer of Newton Centre, Mass., and the late Marion E. Palmer. Rabbi Cary D. Yales officiated at the Boston Harbor Hotel in Boston.

Mrs. Palmer is the director of the IBJ Foundation Inc. in New York, the charitable foundation of the Industrial Bank of Japan. She graduated from Cornell University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia University.

Lesley Beth Harris, the daughter of Hilary and Stanley Harris of Lexington, Mass., was married yesterday to Jay Aaron Palmer, the son of Julian J. Palmer of Newton Centre, Mass., and the late Marion E. Palmer. Rabbi Cary D. Yales officiated at the Boston Harbor Hotel in Boston.

Mrs. Palmer is the director of the IBJ Foundation Inc. in New York, the charitable foundation of the Industrial Bank of Japan. She graduated from Cornell University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia University.
Mr. Palmer is the president of Cardiff Consultants, an interior design concern in New York. He graduated summa cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania.
